title: A simple blood test could spot Parkinson’s years before symptoms - ScienceDaily
summary_full: A simple blood test could spot Parkinson’s years before symptoms  ScienceDaily4 Parkinson’s disease symptoms that can show up decades before a diagnosis  The Washington PostMany people think of a tremor as the quintessential warning sign of Parkinson’s disease. But other symptoms — many of them not involving changes in movement — can appear much earlier. https://wapo.st/4kdPanW  facebook.comBlood Genes Unlock Parkinson’s Motor Fate: Explainable AI Reveals Progression Secrets  WebProNewsDisease progression over time for Parkinson's (IMAGE)  EurekAlert!
